full_sentence: Culture is ,therefore, ultimately determined by race, by the average personality characteristics of people. Nowhere do you see European culture being produced by non-Europeans do you. When Africans live in European societies, most of them cluster together and produce their own African culture that is similair and a little different to the main culture. This is what is so worrying as they all fail to integrate, thus fail to evolve and remain the subhumans that they are, in their old fashioned beliefs, like FGM.
